class.name: ButtonGroup
class.description: Group of [Button]. All direct and indirect children buttons become radios. Only one allows being pressed.

method.name: get_button_list
method.description: Return the list of all the buttons in the group.

method.name: get_pressed_button_index
method.description: Return the index of the pressed button (by tree order).

method.name: set_pressed_button
method.description: Set the button to be pressed.
